name: AssemblyFromSurface
description: Creates Beams and joint rules from a planar brep surface.

inputParameters.name: surface
inputParameters.description: Referenced planar surface from which to generate beams and joint rules.

inputParameters.name: frame_depth
inputParameters.description: thickness of the frame section of the resulting assembly. used to set Beam.height

inputParameters.name: stud_direction
inputParameters.description: (optional) Vector defining the direction of stud in the assembly. Default is world-Z

inputParameters.name: custom_dimensions
inputParameters.description: (optional) From beam dimension component. Beam dimensions must either be defined here or in with beam_width and frame_depth inputs.
